Chinese automakers open factories abroad as export clout causes frictionChinese automakers seeking global growth are building more car factories in overseas markets, as foreign regulators mull imposing measures against imports of China-made electric cars. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:47:55 GMT N6B5PQNUPRO4BDZDFIUXDVCQME https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinese-automakers-open-factories-abroad-export-clout-causes-friction-2024-03-14/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China's plan to cut downpayments for cars likely to fall flat, analysts sayChina's efforts to boost auto sales by cutting downpayments on car loans stand to be frustrated by a price war and consumer caution, chiefly benefiting a few brands favoured by younger buyers, such as Tesla and Nio , analysts said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:35:01 GMT 5HKIOKC3XNOM3JLRLKTHWMQEPA https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/china-plan-cut-down payments-cars-likely-fall-flat-analysts-say-2024-03-14/Qiaoyi Li, Ziyi Tang, Brenda Goh商业汽车与交通
Exclusive: Trump launched CIA covert influence operation against ChinaTwo years into office, President Donald Trump authorized the Central Intelligence Agency to launch a clandestine campaign on Chinese social media aimed at turning public opinion in China against its government, according to former U.S. officials with direct knowledge of the highly classified operation. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:07:05 GMT JK46K2FQTZJEXCVVG5O43CU7ME https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-launched-cia-covert-influence-operation-against-china-2024-03-14/Joel Schectman, Christopher Bing世界美国

Media harassment after China restaurant blast sparks protest, public criticismThe association overseeing Chinese journalists issued a rare statement of protest after reporters were blocked by local residents and security guards while trying to report on the aftermath of a blast outside Beijing. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 09:51:49 GMT L2I4MSMEGNPNDF4IY6EM4MXIYY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/media-harassment-after-chinese-restaurant-blast-spark-protest-public-criticism-2024-03-14/Reuters世界中国
Italy regulator fines TikTok $11 million over content checksItaly's competition watchdog has fined three units of social media giant TikTok 10 million euros ($10.94 million) in total for inadequate checks on content potentially harmful to young or vulnerable users, it said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 09:33:20 GMT Z7KQFUWF3VO2JNUBN6I7Z6UQ7U https://www.reuters.com/technology/italy-regulator-fines-tiktok-11-million-over-inadequate-checks-harmful-content-2024-03-14/Reuters技术
Vietnam urges respect of international law as China draws Gulf of Tonkin baselineVietnam's foreign ministry on Thursday said international law and the rights and interests of other countries must be respected, responding to a question about China's demarcation earlier this month of a baseline in the Gulf of Tonkin. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 09:10:40 GMT 666OINI5DRN2PNNYW57O65EV7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-urges-respect-international-law-china-draws-gulf-tonkin-baseline-2024-03-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
China launch of DRO-A/B satellite on Wednesday not successful - state mediaChina's launch of a DRO-A/B satellite from Xichang satellite launch centre on Wednesday was not successful, the official Xinhua news agency reported on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 08:33:50 GMT A3WFEM6AGNJN7COGTHMGYKYVCU https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/china-launch-dro-ab-satellite-wednesday-not-successful-state-media-2024-03-14/Reuters技术空间
Proposed US TikTok ban 'not fair', China's foreign ministry saysThere is "no fairness to speak of" in citing national security to reduce the competitive advantage of other countries, a spokesperson of the Chinese foreign ministry said on Thursday, criticising a U.S. bill to force a TikTok divestiture or ban. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 08:26:27 GMT 4TW6BAXKNFLNNF3R5NMACRSUDA https://www.reuters.com/technology/proposed-us-tiktok-ban-not-fair-chinas-foreign-ministry-says-2024-03-14/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
China's Tencent takes over two ByteDance video game teams - sourceChina's Tencent has taken over two ByteDance video games units after ByteDance retreated from the gaming business last year, according to a person familiar with the matter. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 08:16:54 GMT IUC6HIONCZPMRPVE5YZL35EAJ4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/chinas-tencent-takes-over-two-bytedance-video-game-teams-source-2024-03-14/Josh Ye技术
Exclusive: Chinese buyers cancel, postpone Australian wheat buys amid global surplusChinese wheat importers have cancelled or postponed about one million metric tons of Australian wheat cargoes, trade sources with direct knowledge of the deals said, as growing world stockpiles drag down prices.
